title: Stephen Colbert - I am America, and so can you - ipod audiobook
description: Realizing that it takes more than thirty minutes a night to fix everything that\&#039;s destroying America, Colbert bravely takes on the forces aligned to destroy our countryÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½whether they be terrorists, environmentalists, or Kashi brand breakfast cereals. His various targets include nature (I\&#039;ve never trusted the sea. What\&#039;s it hiding under there?), the Hollywood Blacklist (I would have named enough names to fill the Moscow phone book), and atheists (Imagine going through life completely duped into thinking that there\&#039;s no invisible, omniscient higher power guiding every action on Earth. It\&#039;s just so arbitrary!). Colbert also provides helpful illustrations and charts (Things That Are Trying to Turn Me Gay) [and] a complete transcript of his infamous speech at the 2006 White House Correspondents\&#039; Dinner [...] all of which add up to a book that is sure to be a bestseller and match the success of Colbert\&#039;s former Daily Show boss Jon Stewart\&#039;s America (The Book).
